scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd .. && cp -r ./client/build/* ./public
scripts.dev: concurrently "export NODE_ENV=test && env PORT=3001 nodemon ./bin/www" "npm run client"
scripts.crater: concurrently "export NODE_ENV=crater && env PORT=3001 nodemon ./bin/www" "npm run client"
scripts.crux: concurrently "export NODE_ENV=crux && env PORT=3001 nodemon ./bin/www" "npm run client"
